us-gaap:definedcontributionplantextblock.D20210201-20220131: 401(k) PlanWe have a qualified defined contribution plan under Section 401(k) of the Internal Revenue Code covering eligible employees. We match a certain portion of employee contributions up to a fixed maximum per employee. Our contributions to the plan were $46 million, $42 million, and $36 million during fiscal 2022, 2021, and 2020, respectively.
